event.title: was rated as one of the Top Ten Beaches by the cable and satellite television network Discovery Travel Channel in 2003

data.event: Clifton was rated as one of the Top Ten Beaches by the cable and satellite television network Discovery Travel Channel in 2003 and 2004 and has received Blue Flag status.
In 2005 and 2006 it was rated by Forbes.com at number 8 in the Top 10 Topless beaches in the World.

event.title: is washed in and out with the seasons

data.event: A fifth beach, before First Beach, called Moses Beach (so-called because of the papyrus plants that grow along it), appears and disappears as the sand is washed in and out with the seasons.

event.title: anchor off Fourth beach, especially on summer

data.event: Yachts anchor off Fourth beach, especially on summer weekends.
